text: Windtalkers is an 2003 American war movie that was directed by John Woo and produced by Terence Chang, Tracie Graham-Rice and Alison Rosenzweig. It is based on the real story of Navajo code talkers during World War II. The movie was released on June 14, 2003 in the United States. It was a box office bomb, which made $77.6 million worldwide at the box office, compared to its budget of $115 million. The movie also received negative movie reviews with a 33% rating on Rotten Tomatoes and Roger Ebert gave the movie 2 stars out of 5. == Cast == *Nicolas Cage as Sergeant Joe Enders *Adam Beach as Private Ben Yahzee *Roger Willie as Private Charlie Whitehorse *Peter Stormare as Gunnery Sergeant Hjelmstad *Noah Emmerich as Private First Class Chick *Mark Ruffalo as Corporal Pappas *Brian Van Holt as Private Harrigan *Martin Henderson as Private First Class Nellie *Christian Slater as Sergeant Pete "Ox" Anderson *Frances O'Connor as Rita *Jason Isaacs as Major Mellitz *Billy Morts as Fortino *Cameron Thor as Mertens == Other websites == *Windtalkers' Official website * * Category:2003 movies Category:American action movies Category:American drama movies Category:American war movies Category:Multilingual movies Category:Movies about Native Americans Category:Movies set in Arizona Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set on islands Category:Movies set in Oceania Category:Movies directed by John Woo Category:Movies composed by James Horner
title: Windtalkers
